H3.text: when did brent barry won the dunk contest. 1996

A4.text: He won the Slam Dunk Contest in the NBA All-Star Weekend in 1996 with a Julius Erving-inspired slam dunk in which he took off from the free throw line to sail in and dunk one-handed.

A5.text: He was the first white player to win the competition.
